Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence to support the assertion that mainstream news media outlets purposely ignored the killing of Cannon Hinnant.
Understate: The claim understates the efforts made by mainstream news media outlets to cover the killing of Cannon Hinnant, as they did report on the incident.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that mainstream news media outlets purposely ignored the killing to further a predetermined racial narrative.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the mainstream news media outlets have a predetermined racial narrative.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for why some news outlets may have given less coverage to this particular case, such as prioritizing other news stories or limited resources.
